Summary: i saw a star in the sky suddenly explode flames i saw 10 time greater than star all done in half a second
divs: Sighting Details I saw a star explode in second like a big explossion in a half of 1second too far with no sound It was arround10 pm in the night I was laying down upon my home roof top. I wondered that it was a star how could it explode. In a couple of milli second all came to normal and the star was disappear. It was my first wounderful experience.
